name.description: The name of the IP configuration.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Bastion Host.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

subnet_id.description: Reference to a subnet in which this Bastion Host has been created.

public_ip_address_id.description: Reference to a Public IP Address to associate with this Bastion Host.

id.description: The ID of the Bastion Host.

dns_name.description: The FQDN for the Bastion Host.

create.description: Used when creating the Bastion Host.

update.description: Used when updating the Bastion Host.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Bastion Host.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Bastion Host.
